jokes.Joke: Last night I was having dinner with Charles Manson, and in the middle of dinner he turned to me and said, `Is it hot in here, or am I crazy?`
jokes.Creator: Gilbert Gottfried

jokes.Joke: I can't even find someone for a platonic relationship, much less the kind where someone wants to see me naked.
jokes.Creator: Gilbert Gottfried

jokes.Joke: At the Last Supper how come no one sat on the other side of the table?... See, I think originally there were people sitting on the other side but those were the people going, �You know, the air conditioning hits me right on the back on the neck.
jokes.Creator: Gilbert Gottfried

jokes.Joke: The pressure to being a comedian is being funny, but I've given that up, so there is no pressure whatsoever.
jokes.Creator: Gilbert Gottfried

jokes.Joke: How exactly do they prove that you've been masturbating? Do they dust for prints?
jokes.Creator: Gilbert Gottfried

jokes.Joke: It’s as if the whole world is your wife,You apologize 24 hours a day, whether you did something wrong or not. (about offended people)
jokes.Creator: Gilbert Gottfried

jokes.Joke: I intended to catch a plane, but could not get a direct flight because ‘they said they have to stop at the Empire State Building first.’ (a week after 9/11)
jokes.Creator: Gilbert Gottfried
